title: Pineapple Fried Rice with Ham
method: Step 1: Whisk soy sauce, sesame oil, ground ginger, and white pepper together in a bowl.

Step 2: Heat olive oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add onion and cook, stirring often, until soft and translucent, 3 to 4 minutes. Add garlic and cook for an additional 30 seconds. Stir in carrots, corn, and peas and stir-fry until vegetables are tender, 3 to 4 minutes.
Step 3: Stir in brown rice, pineapple, ham, green onions, and soy sauce mixture. Cook, stirring constantly, until heated through, about 2 minutes. Serve immediately.
